XenotypeDef.label: Revia
XenotypeDef.description: Revia are near-humans with vulpine traits. Feared in the sector of the galaxy that they exist in for their warlike natures, it is said that Revia accept only one absolute law in their society: the strong live and prosper, and the weak serve the strong in whatever way they are able.Their society worships bloodshed in the name of a certain deity that sits upon a throne of bleached skulls, and will stop at nothing to slake his thirst.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Near-humans with vulpine traits. Blood, blood, blood!
